plot: A mockumentary about a man trying to make a sci-fi classic, Hermaphrodroid - a science fiction thriller about a part-man, part-woman robot on the run from the government.
title: Hermaphrodroid
plot_es: A mockumentary about a man trying to make a sci-fi classic, Hermaphrodroid - a science fiction thriller about a part-man, part-woman robot on the run from the government.
plot_en: A mockumentary about a man trying to make a sci-fi classic, Hermaphrodroid - a science fiction thriller about a part-man, part-woman robot on the run from the government.
